## **Welcome to my page!**
Here, you will find samples of my work. I specialize in using **R**, **Python**, and **Adobe Creative Suite**, including **InDesign**, **Photoshop**, and Illustrator, for data visualization, data wrangling, and data analysis. I also have experience with **ArcGIS Pro**, **ArcGIS Online**, and **QGIS** for **geospatial data analysis**, as well as Jupyter and R Markdown for data visualization and geospatial analysis. Also I can use **SQL** in managing relational database. Additionally, I am currently learning Web Development.


<!-- <center><img src="https://media.giphy.com/media/wLNuW1tCKRiPmDV5Y4/giphy.gif"></center> -->



**My core skills include:**

- Strong computer background with experience in relational databases, Microsoft applications, spreadsheets, word processing, **GIS**, graphic design, and desktop publishing.
- Data management, research, and analysis experience with both quantitative and qualitative data.
- Experience with analytics and visualization tools such as open viz libraries like **Shiny** and **flexdashboard**.
- Experience working and managing teams dispersed geographically.
- Proficient in using and maintaining spatial and non-spatial technology products.
- Experience working with local and international organizations, including UN-IOM, UNDP, UNSPIDER and EU.
- Excellent analytical and organizational skills, communication, writing and reporting skills, and multicultural skills.
- Ability to build strong and sustainable relationships, interact at all levels within the organization, work independently, and lead teams. 
- Thematic experience includes Migration, Displacement, Humanitarian and Droughts.I am also exploring application of AI to optimize outputs.
